
[[/Image:gui-tabpanelandtab.png.md|frame|Two example tabs in a tab panel.]]
The GUI tab class represents GUI tabs in MTA's GUI system. These highly rely on GUI [[/Element/GUI/Tab_panel.md|tab panels]] as they only can be created to them.

The element type of this class is '''"gui-tab"'''.
